page.title: 03COUNCILLOR FOR LITTLE MILL
page.content: I was asked to represent the village on the Goytre Fawr Community Council. This is a great stimulant to me as I help where I can to convey the little worries and complaints that exist in a small village to the council meetings. We act as a liaison between the people and Monmouth District Council, reflecting local opinions. Three colleagues and I represent Little Mill,six other members represent neighbouring areas and we sit with one District Councillor,the Chairlady and Clerk.Meetings are held monthly at a rotation of venues in the locality.
